message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Consider the declining value for both of us as we play.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is more fair, considering the declining value of the money. Let's end this game and take what we can.
Bob, my turn. I understand the time pressure, but your offer was too low. Let's settle this with a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's still a good deal for you considering the rapid devaluation.
